large_size.label: Large headings
large_size.info: Affects large titles from the slider, rich text and image with text sections.

show_secondary_image.label: Show second product media on hover

header__1.info: To display ratings, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews/installation)

show_preloader.label: Image preloader
show_preloader.info: Shows a small circular preloader while images on your store are still loading.

show_breadcrumb.label: Show breadcrumb
show_breadcrumb.info: Breadcrumb navigation helps users navigating through the store and shows up only on collection, product and search pages.

hr.label: Show horizontal rules
hr.info: Displays a small visual horizontal rule on some titles

preloader.label: Media preloader
preloader.info: Shows a small circular preloader while media on your store are still loading.

breadcrumb.label: Show breadcrumb
breadcrumb.info: Breadcrumb navigation helps users to navigate through the store and shows up only on collection, product, search & account pages.

animation_style.label: Caption display (desktop)
animation_style.info: On mobile, the caption will always be visible for better UX

quick_buy.name: Quick buy
quick_buy.info: Adds an instant "add to cart" button. If the product has variants, it will display a "quick buy" popup.
quick_buy.label: Enable quick buy

collections_menu.info: This has a bold design, especially in the classic menu style, where it transforms into a mega menu with the possibility of adding images and a promotion.

show_images.label: Show collection images
show_images.info: Only applies if the parent items is a collection.

show.label: Show promotion block
show.info: In minimal style it shows at the bottom of the menu drawer. In classic style it shows in the collections menu, if present.

mobile_layout.label: Turn into a horizontal slider on mobile devices

settings.link_info: The link will turn into a smart object if it is a product or a collection.
settings.product_info: This theme can show unique content for individual product pages. [Learn more](https://shopify-support.krownthemes.com/article/378-product-pages#unique-promotions)

desktop_layout.label: Desktop layout
desktop_layout.info: On mobile devices the layout will always be full width

mobile_layout.info: Optional color control for when collection images are shown behind text

style.label: Layout
style.info: Adjacent collections appear only if they exist

show_image.label: Show collection image
show_image.info: If a collection doesn't have an image, the featured image of the first product will be used

header.label: Product header
header.info: On mobile devices the product header will always appear at the top, above the product gallery.

gallery_aspect.label: Scale slider images to fit the viewport
gallery_aspect.info: On mobile, images will always fit the device's viewport.

color_swatches.label: Show color swatches (only for block style)
color_swatches.info: This theme can show custom images for color swatches. [Learn more](https://shopify-support.krownthemes.com/article/554-using-color-swatches)

layout.label: Layout
layout.info: On mobile devices the image will be in a full width row, but the text settings will be kept.

api.label: Google Maps API key
api.info: You'll need to register a [Google Maps API Key](http://shopify-support.krownthemes.com/article/385-generate-an-api-key-for-google-maps) to display the map.

image.label: Image
image.info: Displayed if the map cannot load.

background.label: Custom background color
background.info: Only for the split screen layout

overlay.label: Image overlay
overlay.info: Only for the full width layout

mobile_layout.info: On mobile devices the scrolling slider will turn into a horizontal swiping slider.

video.label: Video URL (.mp4 file)
video.info: Also provide a fallback image which will show if the video cannot be played.

image.label: Image
image.info: It is best to provide a square image for the split screen style and a landscape image for the full width style.

mobile_image.label: Mobile image
mobile_image.info: An alternative image that will show up on mobile devices

settings.mobile_layout: Will turn into a horizontal swiping slider
settings.slider_colors: On mobile devices the text will be over the image. You can choose custom colors in this case, for better visibility.

image.label: Image
image.info: If you want to add a custom image for the collection.

paragraph.content: All of your collections are listed by default. To customize your list, choose 'Selected' and add collections.

sort.label: Sort collections by:
sort.info: Sorting only applies when 'All' is selected

icons.label: Icons
icons.info: To visualize all the icons included in the theme, please visit [this link](https://krownthemes.com/krown-icons/)

language_selector.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

currency_selector.info: To add a currency, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

menu_1.label: First menu
menu_1.info: This menu won't show dropdown items

labels.label: Label
labels.info: Make sure that all of your fields have unique labels!

url.label: Link
url.info: The entire block will transform into a link unless there is a label for the button

aspect_ratio.label: Images aspect ratio
aspect_ratio.info: When using the natural aspect ratio, make sure that you resize your thumbnails at the same size, for a clean grid design. Using one of the cropped setting, all thumbnails will be resized to the same dimension.

style_mobile.label: Turn gallery into a slider on mobile

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

mobile_design.label: Turn the vertical slider into a horizontal one on mobile

link.label: Link
link.info: Unless there is a label for the button, the link will be on the text.

image.label: Fallback image
image.info: A fallback image will be used on mobile devices where autoplay might be disabled.

header__1.info: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/themes/development/recommended-products)

open_first.label: Have the first toggle opened by default

image.label: Image
image.info: 1240 x 400px .jpg recommended. It only appears on desktop

paragraph.content: To change collection descriptions or collection images, [edit your collections.](/admin/collections)

show_collection_image.label: Show collection image
show_collection_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio.

low_inventory_notification.label: Inventory notification
low_inventory_notification.info: Variants need to have inventory tracking enabled in order for this feature to work. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/inventory/track_inventory)

options__2.label: Show a notice if inventory falls below 5

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Heading

enable_sticky_info.label: Enable sticky product information on large screens

gallery_slider_style.label: Scale slider images to fit the viewport

gallery_style.label: Gallery style
gallery_style.info: Defaults to slider for mobile devices
